title: Star.Trek.TNG.S01.FIXED.EPISODES.720p.BluRay.x264-INQUISITION (S
description:
As you probably know, the first Blu-Ray "Season 1" release of Star Trek TNG contained a few episodes with bad audio. CBS issued a replacement for the bad discs but I did not find any torrent with re-ripped (corrected) episodes.

As far as I know, six episodes were affected. So I decided to fix them myself by simply removing their bad audio track and replacing it with the audio track from the DVD ripped MKV release which had the audio in AC3 5.1 format (BluRay ripped MKVs here had DTS 5.1 audio). I did not touch the video in any way. So the result is perfectly fine. 


DVD rip MKV release from which I took the audio tracks for the 6 episodes:
Star.Trek.The.Next.Generation.Complete.NTSC.DVD.DD5.1.x264-JCH


These are the corrected episodes contained in this torrent:

Star.Trek.TNG.S01E10.Hide.And.Q.FIXED.720p.BluRay.x264-INQUISITION.mkv
Star.Trek.TNG.S01E11.Haven.FIXED.720p.BluRay.x264-INQUISITION.mkv
Star.Trek.TNG.S01E12.The.Big.Goodbye.FIXED.720p.BluRay.x264-INQUISITION.mkv
Star.Trek.TNG.S01E13.Datalore.FIXED.720p.BluRay.x264-INQUISITION.mkv
Star.Trek.TNG.S01E15.11001001.FIXED.720p.BluRay.x264-INQUISITION.mkv
Star.Trek.TNG.S01E16.Too.Short.A.Season.FIXED.720p.BluRay.x264-INQUISITION.mkv

Again, this is a home-made fix for the affected episodes. It is not a re-rip of a reissued Blu-Ray disc.
